usage_guide_content_1: 1. Applications include two types: Chat Bot and Workflow. Chat Bots are suitable for beginners. After associating with a knowledge base, you can create a Q&A bot based on private knowledge with simple configuration. Workflows are suitable for advanced users, using pre-built system nodes to customize task processes for solving complex tasks.
usage_guide_content_2: 2. The Discover module also provides rich templates. You can select suitable templates to quickly create applications as needed.
link_more_mcp_square: More MCP? Go to MCP Square
